title: IndexReaderFactory should have a close() method for cleanup
description:
The custom IndexReaderFactory may choose to pool some resources that needs to be cleaned up.

IndexReaderFactory should contract a new method, e.g. close() such that when called, the implementation can choose to do some cleanup.

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content: We could just add it to the classes that are allowed to be core aware.

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content: Closing old issue that I'm very surprised if it is still an issue
